name: Rebuilding DevOps from the ground up with Adam Jacob, Co-founder & CEO of System Initiative (Changelog Interviews #545)
summary: This week we’re joined by Adam Jacob and we’re talking about his mission at System Initiative to rebuild DevOps. They are out of stealth mode and ready to show off their transformative new power tool that reimagines what’s possible from DevOps. It’s an intelligent automation platform that allows DevOps teams to build d...
